The Prince denies all the allegations. sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_10
sentences.sentence: the influential gadget show CES is back on in Las Vegas, but how big will this year's event be?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Usually out in force, several tech giants have opted to only take part online and not in person due to ongoing uncertainty surrounding the COVID-19 Omicron variant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: For diehard fans of the Nevada trade show, that's a pity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: CES is the biggest tech event of the year, and it's usually where we hear the biggest announcements from the biggest names and have all of these companies come together. With so many major players pulling out, you can really feel that CES isn't going to be what we had hoped it would be.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Whether it's artificial intelligence or self-driving cars, in recent years, the Consumer Electronics Show, or CES for short, has focused on longer-term technology trends.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: But with so much innovation under one roof, it's still a great place to find the latest gadget, like this device, which prints temporary tattoos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: You can pick the design that you want, and then it can apply within a few seconds.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: This tattoo goes one or two days, and then if you want to take it out and just take a shower, and then with soap and water, it will completely go.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The event also caters for dog lovers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This wearable monitor enables owners to check their pet's heart and respiratory rate. Tennis world number one Novak Djokovic looks set to play in the Australian Open after being

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: granted a Covid-19 medical exemption.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Djokovic has previously refused to publicly disclose his vaccine status.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Taking to social media, the nine-time winner of the tournament revealed he'd been given the green light to defend his title down under.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: This week, organisers said some unvaccinated players had been given medical exemptions to play.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The tournament in Melbourne, which gets underway later this month provides Djokovic with another chance to move ahead of Roger Federer and Rafael Nadal. All three have won 20 Grand Slam titles each.
